name: Diana Shipping Inc.
description: Diana Shipping Inc. is a global provider of shipping transportation services through its ownership of a modern fleet of dry bulk vessels. Founded in 1999 and headquartered in Athens, Greece, the company specializes in the transportation of dry bulk cargoes, including commodities such as iron ore, coal, and grain. Diana Shipping operates a diverse fleet of Capesize, Panamax, and Supramax vessels, all equipped with advanced technology to ensure efficiency and reliability in shipping operations. The company is committed to maintaining high standards of safety and environmental compliance, implementing best practices in the maritime industry. With a focus on long-term relationships, Diana Shipping offers its services to a range of clients, including commodity traders and industrial end-users. The company's strategic approach to fleet management includes a balanced mix of spot market and time charter contracts, providing flexibility and stability in revenue generation. In recent years, Diana Shipping has also emphasized sustainability initiatives, investing in eco-friendly technologies and practices that reduce the carbon footprint of its operations. As a publicly traded company on the New York Stock Exchange, Diana Shipping is positioned to navigate the complexities of the global shipping market and deliver value to its shareholders.

seo.meta_title: Diana Shipping Inc. | Global Shipping Transportation Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Diana Shipping Inc., a leader in dry bulk shipping. Learn about our fleet, services, and commitment to sustainability in maritime transport.

faq.question: What services does Diana Shipping provide?
faq.answer: Diana Shipping provides shipping transportation services for dry bulk cargoes, including iron ore, coal, and grain.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Diana Shipping?
faq.answer: The CEO of Diana Shipping Inc. is S. D. Kallitsas.

faq.question: Where is Diana Shipping headquartered?
faq.answer: Diana Shipping is headquartered in Athens, Greece.

faq.question: What types of vessels does Diana Shipping operate?
faq.answer: Diana Shipping operates Capesize, Panamax, and Supramax vessels.
